3rd Party Memory Boards  

 

  

 

 

 

Tiny Tek 16K RAM Board

16K RAM Board Font

16K RAM Board Back

 

This is the Tiny Tek Inc. - Anderson Peripherals 16K Memory Board.   Manufactured and sold out of Dallas, Texas and also Quintan, Texas.  This board offered Atari 800 users (the board physically would not fit into an Atari 400 computer) a lower cost alternative to upgrading the memory of their system. Board appears to be Serial # 0059.

 

The Installation instructions were simply and straight forward on how to open the Atari 800 and install the board. The instructions also included a full detailing of the parts on the board as well as a schematic of the design.

Thank you to Karl Heller for identifying this board and also for providing the Installation manual:  CLICK HERE
